title: Kaamelott - Premier volet
description: The sequel on the big screen to the cult series of Alexandre Astier, an offbeat version of the legend of the Knights of the Round Table. Hidden in Rome, King Arthur plans his comeback to oppose the army of his former friend Lancelot.
cast: Christian Clavier, Sting, Alain Chabat, Clovis Cornillac

title: Eternals
description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.
cast: Angelina Jolie, Richard Madden, Salma Hayek, Kumail Nanjiani

title: The King's Man
description: As a collection of history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds gather to plot a war to wipe out millions, one man must race against time to stop them.
cast: Gemma Arterton, Ralph Fiennes, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Matthew Goode

title: Black Widow
description: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.
cast: Florence Pugh, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr., Rachel Weisz

title: Tenet
description: An action epic revolving around international espionage, time travel, and evolution. Possibly about a man trying to prevent World War 3 through time travel and rebirth.
cast: Elizabeth Debicki, Robert Pattinson, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Kenneth Branagh

title: Free Guy
description: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.
cast: Taika Waititi, Jodie Comer, Ryan Reynolds, Joe Keery

description: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.
cast: Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay, Daniel Mays, Colin Firth

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
cast: Ana de Armas, Daniel Craig, Léa Seydoux, Ralph Fiennes

title: Dune
description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.
cast: Rebecca Ferguson, Timothée Chalamet, Zendaya, Jason Momoa

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
cast: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Val Kilmer, Jon Hamm

title: The New Mutants
description: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
cast: Anya Taylor-Joy, Maisie Williams, Alice Braga, Charlie Heaton

title: Dolittle
description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen, Jim Broadbent

title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.
cast: Margot Robbie, Rosie Perez, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Jurnee Smollett-Bell

title: Soul
description: A musician who has lost his passion for music is transported out of his body and must find his way back with the help of an infant soul learning about herself.
cast: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Quest Love, Phylicia Rashad

title: Bad Boys for Life
description: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life.
cast: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig

title: Onward
description: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.
cast: Tom Holland, Chris Pratt, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Octavia Spencer

title: Wonder Woman 1984
description: Plot unknown. A sequel to the 2017 superhero film 'Wonder Woman.'
cast: Pedro Pascal, Gal Gadot, Connie Nielsen, Chris Pine

title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
description: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.
cast: Mckenna Grace, Bokeem Woodbine, Carrie Coon, Annie Potts

title: Venom 2
description: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2018 film 'Venom'.
cast: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Woody Harrelson, Naomie Harris

title: The Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
description: Sequel to the 2017 action/comedy.
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L. Jackson, Morgan Freeman, Salma Hayek

title: Jungle Cruise
description: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.
cast: Dwayne Johnson, Emily Blunt, Jesse Plemons, Paul Giamatti

title: The French Dispatch
description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".
cast: Elisabeth Moss, Timothée Chalamet, Saoirse Ronan, Léa Seydoux

title: Mulan
description: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father. A live-action feature film based on Disney's 'Mulan.'
cast: Yifei Liu, Donnie Yen, Li Gong, Jet Li

title: West Side Story
description: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.
cast: Ansel Elgort, Rita Moreno, Corey Stoll, Maddie Ziegler

title: Scoob!
description: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.
cast: Mark Wahlberg, Zac Efron, Mckenna Grace, Amanda Seyfried

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
description: In a realm known as Lumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.
cast: Awkwafina, Cassie Steele

title: Death on the Nile
description: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.
cast: Gal Gadot, Emma Mackey, Armie Hammer, Kenneth Branagh

title: Greyhound
description: Early in World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy captain must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by Nazi U-boat wolfpacks.
cast: Tom Hanks, Elisabeth Shue, Stephen Graham, Karl Glusman

title: Godzilla vs. Kong
description: As the gigantic Kong meets the unstoppable Godzilla, the world watches to see which one of them will become King of the Monsters.
cast: Eiza González, Millie Bobby Brown, Alexander Skarsgård, Danai Gurira

title: Morbius
description: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.
cast: Adria Arjona, Jared Leto, Michael Keaton, J.K. Simmons

title: Benedetta
description: A 17th-century nun in Italy suffers from disturbing religious and erotic visions. She is assisted by a companion, and the relationship between the two women develops into a romantic love affair.
cast: Charlotte Rampling, Lambert Wilson, Virginie Efira, Olivier Rabourdin

title: Artemis Fowl
description: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.
cast: Colin Farrell, Josh Gad, Judi Dench, Miranda Raison
